SELECT u.userNo, u.username r.replyNo, r.menuNo, r.replyContent, r.rImg, r.regDate, r.heart FROM reply r INNER JOIN reply r ON u.userNo = r.userNo INNER JOIN menu m ON r.menuNo = m.menuNo WHERE .userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu(goodsNum,menuPrice, menuCate, menuTitle ,menuContent, regDate, readCount, heart , mImg, mdImg, business) VALUES ( #{goodsNum}, #{menuPrice},#{menuCate}, #{menuTitle}, #{menuContent},#{regDate},#{readCount}, #{heart}, #{mImg}, #{mdImg}, #{regDate})
INSERT INTO cart(menuNo, userNo, menuCount) VALUES (#{menuNo}, #{userNo}, #{menuCount})
mapper.select: SELECT u.userNo, c.menuNo, c.menuCount, m.menuTitle, m.menuPrice FROM user u INNER JOIN cart c ON u.userNo = c.userNo INNER JOIN menu m ON c.menuNo = m.menuNo WHERE u.userNo = #{userNo}
